name: Lost in Translation (Giancarlo Taveira)
description:
The world is full of diversity and there are so many different languages in the world. Sometimes we may feel lost, and sometimes we find ourselves connected to other people and other cultures through the power of speech.

This game challenges you to identify 23 different languages. Even if you don't speak a certain language, you may still be able to identify it!
The TOP 10 scores in the world are proudly featured on the MainMenu screen. What's YOUR best score?

This game is a submission to the Global Game Jam 2021.

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/lost-translation-1
